alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pondera; Eastern Teton; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 5:26PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Pondera and north central Teton Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 525 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northwest of Choteau, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pendroy and Bynum. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Pondera; Eastern Teton; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
